Keywords: Armor , Cosmic , Deity , Latveria , Mystical , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering. This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters. (May target adjacent or non-adjacent opposing characters.)
HMMM... AND DO YOU HAVE AN INFINITY GAUNTLET NOW?: FREE: Choose an opposing character within range and line of fire. That character can't use the EFFECT of Equipment until your next turn.
GOD OF BATTLEWORLD: When establishing themed teams, God Emperor Doom gains all Battleworld keywords. // Leadership, Perplex, Colossal Stamina. When God Emperor Doom uses Perplex to target another character with a Battleworld keyword, you may instead modify a combat value except damage by +2 or -2.
THE WRATH OF DOOM CANNOT BE IGNORED: CLOSE: Make a close attack. Other characters can't use powers (during that attack).
YOU HAD TO MEDDLE, DIDN'T YOU?: STOP. Battle Fury, Exploit Weakness. When this click is first revealed, remove all action tokens from God Emperor Doom.

bam
@Coyote's own Thank you. I misunderstood. Let's get the text of the Ego Gem here. INDESTRUCTIBLE EQUIP: ANY UNEQUIP: DROP EFFECT: This character can be equipped with any number of [ABPaI] Infinity Gems with different names. FREE: Choose a combat value to modify +1 until your next turn. Light Object Let's also look at EQUIP & UNEQUIP. The key rules of equipment are:------------------------------------------------------------- • When you equip something, you place it on the equipped character’s card (off the map) and that character can use the EFFECT ability as listed.---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- • A character can only have one game element equipped to it at a time. (EGO Gem allows for more of course) ------------------------------------------- • When an equipped character is KO’d, replaced, or is equipped again, the currently equipped item becomes unequipped. ----------------------- • You can only equip standard characters. If an effect causes an equipped standard character to become non-standard (such as becoming or ), they stay equipped, but can’t use the equipment’s EFFECT ability. ----------------- An equipped character that joins a force that isn’t its starting force (such as via Mind Control) also can’t use the equipment’s EFFECT ability while it’s part of that other force. I believe the last paragraph has the answer. ...It is my best guess that the shutting down the EGO Gem with g.E. Doom shuts down ALL of of the other gems the EGO wielder has equipped. ------------- The other gems however,( based on the concept in the last paragraph) are not unequipped... they would be equipped, inert, and mostly if not totally useless.
